lexUnit.name: chin.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the protruding part of the face below the mouth, formed by the apex of the lower jaw.

sentence.text: From the trembling chins of old men ,
A woman stood at the shallow end , her hand under the chin of a small child , encouraging it along .
She had n't turned the light out , and now , propped up by her pillows , the bedclothes tucked under her chin , she sat staring straight ahead .
Her chin was straight .
The agogiati raised his blue chin and eyebrows in a silent no , then turned contemptuously away .
In the car , my colleague put his elbow on the wheel and drove with his chin cupped in his hands .
He raised his chin , looking at Yin Tsu , who nodded , his face held rigid in a grimace of pain .
Lifting her chin , she looked him in the eye .

Her baby chin , her drooping petal of lower lip , her tousled mane of blonde tresses , her girlish gingham dresses with white dýlletage , combined to create a look of chaste girlhood with a strong hint that she would be quite prepared for you to sully it .
He stroked his round , dumpling chin .
He looked down at her , at her out-thrust chin and flashing eyes , and , to her surprise , he laughed , really laughed , in a way he had not done before .
Many of the publicity stills make a great play of the stiff , straight back , the proudly jutting chin , and the tranced demeanour crossed with a hint of aloofness .

Then she sat down beside Tug , put her elbows on the table and rested her chin in the palms of her hands .
De Nesle rested his chin on his hand and looked at Guy for a moment .
She tilted her chin at him .
Kate leant her chin on her hands as she considered his last words .

The high cheekbones , " he ran his finger from her chin to just below the eye .

She had an obstinate chin , a cruel mouth and small arrogant eyes .
He had his chin resting on his hand , and one finger was against his long nose in a curious gesture that suggested that he was saying one thing and meaning another .
If Bootsy had a chin , it was not much in evidence and Matthew could see two distinct pimples beside his nose .
His hair was almost black , without a trace of grey , and he had one of those smooth , delicately bluish chins , which suggest the use of expensive after-shave preparations on a virile male skin .

Winston Smith , his chin nuzzled into his breast in an effort to escape the vile wind , slipped quickly through the glass doors of Victory Mansions , though not quickly enough to prevent a swirl of gritty dust from entering along with him .
